pages.title: Ur-Essenz Rüstung
pages.text: Using the primal Essence you collected from all around the world, you manage to infuse the already powerful Netherite Armor with it to make it even stronger.$(br)Each piece of the set grants you unique effects.$(br)When you have the full set equipped you can additionally $(l)double jump$() by pressing the key a second time while in the air.$(br)It also seems that $(l)Piglins aren't aggressive$(), when you are wearing a piece of Essence Armor.

pages.title: Primal Essence Helmet
pages.text: The Primal Essence allows you to fuse the Turtle Shell with your netherite helmet, giving you $(l)10s of Water Breathing$().

pages.title: Primal Essence Chestplate
pages.text: The Primal Essence allows you to fuse the $(l)Elytra$() with your Netherite Chestplate, allowing you the fly like you're used to without loosing the chestplates protection.

pages.title: Primal Essence Boots
pages.text: Allows you to sustain a two block higher fall without taking damage.
